sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import { Link as RRLink } from 'react-router-dom' import Box from './Box' const GenericLink = ({ to, ...rest }: { to: string }) => to && to.match(/^(https:\/\/*|http:\/\/*|mailto:*)/) ? ( {rest.children} ) : ( ) const Link = (props:any) => Link.defaultProps = { as: GenericLink, color: 'text', } export default Link
